data.title: Atheist Activist and Educator:Paul Kurtz
data.meta_description: Paul Kurtz  was a prominent American skeptic and secular humanist. He has been called "the father of secular humanism".
data.text:
Name: Paul Kurtz

Born: Paul Winter KurtzDecember 21, 1925Newark, New Jersey, United States

Died: October 20, 2012 (aged 86)Amherst, New York

Alma mater:New York UniversityColumbia University

Known for: Committee for Skeptical InquiryCenter for InquiryCouncil for Secular Humanism

Influenced by: Sidney Hook

Spouse(s): Claudine Vial

Children: Jonathan KurtzValerie Fehrenback, Patricia KurtzAnne Kurtz

Parents: Sara LasserMartin Kurtz
